content.detailedDescription: I was in my late teens and was sitting on the steps at the back door of my families house when i noticed what i thought was an airplane it was silver reflective shiny almost but still it was so far away i just assumed it was an airplane at that point it did something incredible it was flying at a steady pace when all the sudden it accelerated to a speed i've never seen another aircraft achieve in a fraction of a second it zipped off i've never told anyone but my wife about this experience and it changed my life profoundly i had to know whether or not we are alone in the universe i watched every show and read every book on the subject of ufos i'm still not sure what it was but it couldn't be from earth
content.summary: Was watching what i thought was a plane flying when all the sudden it zipped off at incredible speeds

content.detailedDescription:
my sons and i were on our way back from colorado. we stopped at a place just west of green river, utah. now this place i had first visited about 10 to 12 years ago and have revisited it several times over the years. it’s a pretty interesting area with a lot of petrified wood every place you look. this particular area we were looking in, i had found some petrified wood, and it was kind of strange, to me and had an appearance of being worked by forces other than nature. since that time i always had been compelled to return to the area, i always felt that there was something more to find, something even out of the ordinary. 
 i checked on the geology of the area and found that the deposit are from best i could tell where laid down during the eocene epoch that lasted 56 to 33 million years ago. i also had a suspicion that petrified wood and uranium went hand in hand, which was confirmed by google. this whole area is known for its mining of that element.
 so back to sunday, we were finding a lot of petrified wood, and again some of it looked as if it was somehow worked. we were in a canyon with mesas on both sides and the strata the trees were deposited was obvious, it was a mud layer about mid-way up the mesa. the deposit above was harder than the mud layer, so it was decomposing faster and more complete. after walking down from the top of the mesa we headed down into the talus slope near the point it levels off. there was mud sediments all around, in pretty small pieces. it was then i notice something unusual just breaking the surface of the ground. it appeared circular, i picked it up and noticed that it in fact was round, perfectly round and was out of place. 
 the object was not cut or cored or chiseled, as you can see in the third photo. it appears that when the mud was soft, there was something that made an impression then was filled in by the harder rock over time, then the softer mud rock eroded leaving this cast if you will. the impression is a perfect 6 inches in diameter, plus or minus one inch thick and has at least 4 or more striations making up the disk. the impression was made when the trees were still wood and not yet petrified. notice the same size dimples directly across from one another at its diameter. whatever made this impression was flat on the bottom. this rock, object or whatever you call it is definitely weird, and seems to have been made by something other than a natural occurrence. to me along with the wood that seemed to have been worked, it’s almost gives the feeling that this might have been made some machine or landing craft. what do you think? if it was an impression made by some natural force what could it have been? it’s not a dinosaur foot print since the dinosaurs had been gone some 10 million years before the eocene epoch.
content.summary: 20 to 50 million year imprint

content.detailedDescription:
Looking outside at night around 11.00 pm with my forward looking infrared  i saw a disc above my house i was under the disc directly looking up it was hovering as soon as it realized i could see them because you could not see this with the naked eye it bugged out at a high rate of speed, meaning it did not blink out it left so fast it was amazing.  the height of the disc i could not figure out but if you took a garbage can lid placed up on a tree about 35 feet this is the size of this object. this was difently a disc i saw it clearly they can cloak there heat signature gave them up. also when i was younger i lived in tennant california around 1972 one night we where looking for skylab around midnight when a giant box shaped ufo came over our heads it was a full moon and you could see it was metallic with windows and light coming through i would say it was around 150 from tree top height so maybe 225 feet it made no sound not even wind it moved at a consistent pace not to fast or slow . i don't know if i have been abducted when i was younger i had sleep paralysis allot and a very odd dream two greys showed me,the mayan calendar  and the center became a black hole the odd thing about this is i hade no clue the mayans considered the supermassive black hole in our galaxy the creator and the face on the calendar is the black hole i learned this in my dream this was pretty strange.

you should put above your head for direction because it was directly above my head

i use flir and night vision 
 
they can difently cloak this is a fact
content.summary: Looking up with a flir  i saw a disc , distance  if you took a garbage can lid and put in at tree top height this is the sive

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from a softball game at 9:20 with another guy.  both of us saw the object and both agreed this was no helicopter and appeared to both of us like a ball of fire or fire colored orb, yellow/orange/red. we were stopped at a red light and watched the object through the entire  time stopped.  i looked away when the light turned green.  i looked back one last time and the object was still there but in an instant was gone.  it didn't fly away or descend/ascend, it just disappeared.  i wouldn't call myself a skeptic or a believer but this was truly the oddest thing i have ever seen.  without a doubt not an airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: Couldnt make out structure, orange fire like appearance in the shape of a circle/orb, disappeared in an instant

content.detailedDescription: Orange glowing ball see. over roof top moving very fast then disappeared in to space after moving across most of visible sky then about 3-4 mins later a second one appeared same thing happened this one moved fast i mean fast
content.summary: Orange glowing ball very fast moving then another i few mins later same path

content.detailedDescription: At party. house on cliff top blocks n of suquamish pier. iheard my nephew state, look,a ufo. it appeared from behind a tree blocking the view on our left. i didnt know what i was looking at but have trained as an observer. it was golden to yellow about the size of a good sized box truck. agiant chinese lantern. the surface was energy. i moved to the cliff edge(it was about the same height, a bit higher) it cruised s and i saw it from behind. it had a ring in it's stern that i could see through and saw the sky through it. the sides were curved like a those round fish you see in an aquarium. it reached the pier and turned straight up acceslerateing a bit faster than a f-18. thousands of feet (6?) and appeared to disapeared. like it popped out of sight. i was overwehelmed a bit. and then it did it again! i mean what the hell! i saw what i thought was a trace of electron flow eminateing from the forward quadrant like a subtle fanshape not outside it outline but a flow within the surface with some trace just barely off the bottom. i know now the depth of the unknown. the reality, the certainy  of what i cant say. excuse the spelling but i hate spell check. call me if you want, as i would like to speak this disturbing experiance. other wittness tend toward denial. i wish i could. not really! yikes. thanks, will.
content.summary: Chinese lantern shape n to s than straight up fast. height to dissappeared. than repeated exact same  flight path!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on morada ln toward the freeway, i stopped at the stop sign then made a left turn to enter the freeway, i then saw a blinking light that was so bright that it lit up my car, so i stopped and rolled the window down to see what it was.  there above the trees was this object moving slow  coming in my direction and making no noise. the object was to the left of me and i saw 4 stationary lights and on blinking on top of the 4 of them.  i was trying to figure out what it was as it kept coming toward me. i then looked around to see if anyone else was in the area because i was blocking the entrance to the freeway.  i was all by myself as i sat there and stared at the object, then i thought that i'd better leave so that nothing happens to me and i didn't want to be late for work. so i put the car in drive and entered the freeway and proceeded to travel north towards sacramento. i watched the object until i was out of sight.  the lights were so bright that i could see the object several miles down the road.
content.summary: Large object with 4 white lights side by side and a blinking light at the top of it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the store when i saw these bright lights in the west, i stood there for a few minutes and as the object flew right over my head, i saw the distinct outline of a "v" shaped craft, there was no sound except for the air it was displacing. it headed due east, and then in less than a minute, there was a globe that was multi colored and appeared to be tumbling from the inside with rainbow colors, it seemed to be following the "v" shaped craft.
i went home and told my wife, however she did not believe me.
i figured that it was some kind of us. military test plane.
i have never talked to anyone about this since that night, however, i thought you folks might be able to make sense out of it.
content.summary: A triangular shaped object came out of the west , followed by a brightly lit ball about 50 feet in diameter, tumbling, but going in the same direction as the aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Had several experiences that i can not explain. it sounds crazy, but i know it happened.Had some sort of contact with something and was "taken" away and then returned. my whole body vibrated or tingled, not shook, the whole next day that i had to call in sick to work.It's too long a story about the multiple experiences to write it down here in words.
content.summary: Not sure. telepathic during what might be considered abduction

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting out on balcony laying down looking up at stars talking with two family members. 
objects flew in to my view from behind the roof of my building. 
thought it must have been a flock of geese until i realized the speed at which they covered half the city, and the disc shapes.
several (hundreds??/) of discs flying in a gigantic straight line formation that must have covered a tremendously vast distance. if i were a more educated man i would be able to tell you how far, but the distance was so huge it could not have been birds or planes. i'll show anyone i can via google maps or a personal explanation if you'd like
they flew in a straight line towards the middle of the city and disappeared (disintegrated is the more appropriate word.)

i was stunned and couldn't even talk, i simply pointed and said uuh, uuuuuuh, everyone looked up and they saw them too, we talked about it for hours, we all know what we just witnessed. incredible! 

we lost sight of it when we saw them all disintegrate at once in to nothingness.
content.summary: Fleet flew over building and disintigrated after flying over city. very fast. no sound, shielded in some way hard to focus on. 3 witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: I happened to be in the backyard putting some bottles into the recycling bin, when i observed, for a approximately three minutes, an atypical orange light (with a faint "winged" glow on each side of center), from the east moving in a straight line (in a controlled, directed path), slowly westward, then disappeared right before my eyes as i was watching it. there was no sound accompanying it. this moving object was not one of those orange lanterns that are  commonly seen during and round the 4th of july festivities. this subject "aircraft" for lack of a better word, was much higher in altitude to be one of those festive orange orbs that meanders aimlessly through the sky until it fades out. i'd like to know whether anyone in this area on same date saw something similar to what i'm describing in this account. please and thank you for your time.
content.summary: Atypical orange light (with a faint "winged" glow on each side of center), from the east moving in a straight line (in a controlled, directed path), slowly westward, then disappeared right before my eyes

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the clouds. i noticed something behind the clouds. i continued to take several pictures. i really didn't see much change, or movement. when i was finished taking pictures, i enlarged them. that's when i noticed the object, and that it had moved several times while i was taking the pictures.Much to my surprise the object appeared to move a great distance in a short period of time. it had a pink ora surrounding it, and also had what appeared to be perfectly spaced squares around it. i have never seen anything like what i saw that night. thanks to modern technology, i was able to enlarge the pictures for a better view. i must say, that i am very curious to find out as much as i can about my sighting.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the clouds, noticed something behind clouds. then saw more clearly in pictures.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the clouds. i noticed something behind the clouds. i continued to take several pictures. i really didn't see much change, or movement. when i was finished taking pictures, i enlarged them. that's when i noticed the object, and that it had moved several times while i was taking the pictures.Much to my surprise the object appeared to move a great distance in a short period of time. it had a pink ora surrounding it, and also had what appeared to be perfectly spaced squares around it. i have never seen anything like what i saw that night. thanks to modern technology, i was able to enlarge the pictures for a better view. i must say, that i am very curious to find out as much as i can about my sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I


was working in june lake central office when i step outside for a brake
i look north and saw 3 flying objects in formation.One in the the frount
the 2 where fling behind above left and right they where about 1000 ft up and moveing slow.They came right at me then slowly turn west.No sound.
if they where jets i would have heard themi
 i got a good look at them.They were ufo i couldn't belive   my eyere 
they were about 40ft wide and 30 ft high.Big enough for 1 person.They flew over silver lake.This was in 1978.They had windows but they were pot holes in a ship round.I have long since retired form the telephone company.No one belives me not even my wife.I wish would have never seen them .I think they came area 51
content.summary: Working for telephone company saw 3 ufo going n to s about 1000 a 100 mph

content.detailedDescription:
This was 1999 or 98 was in the backyard playing basketball with my younger brother we noticed right up in the sky we thought it was a satellite. as we continue to watch this objectwe noticed it started to take a path and descend upon us in the backyard. it looks almost like a jellyfish,orb shape, transparent, bright glowing, lights and looked as if it had a tail. actually look like a craft but a possible being. it started to descend down upon me i was afraid and me and my brother ran into the house. a third sibling also saw this object from inside the house

my second sighting was about six or seven years later i was inside my home alone and the same object came inside the house through the wall and hovered over me this time there was no glowing lights but the same object transparent and all. it seemed to be investigating me for a second time 


i remember being chased by this object in my dreams in my earlier childhood days
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo visted me twice the same craft. very small and almost transparent about the size of a basketball came with in 5 ft

content.detailedDescription: Noticed something too bright to be a planet in the night sky, glowing and yellow. after a few minutes it slowly descended below the horizon.
content.summary: Noticed something too bright to be a planet in the night sky, glowing and yellow. after a few minutes it slowly descended below the horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't know any other way to contact you but this is about the m.I.B as they are called. they are sanctioned by the government to investigate any and all u.F.O sightings. they have gone more towards the rogue side of it and took on a life of its own. they now don't report to any form of government except for their superiors. any one that goes missing is not a sanctioned action by any one but them. they do have a long reach in and out of government. 
  another subject that i acutely have a theory about. the implants that have been reported i believe they are just like the tags we attach to animals before releasing them back in the wild.
content.summary: M.I.B

content.detailedDescription:
I have an excellent memory especially when it comes to this incident. i have replayed it in my mind for the past 40 years and remember it as if it was yesterday.  i tell the same, consistent story each time to anyone who will listen, so it is always fresh in my mind.  

brother was 12, 10(me), and 8 sister. 1975.   rural area. dusk outside...Evening was just beginning around 8pm.   brother came rushing into home shouting about a ufo outside.  we hesitated thinking he was pulling our leg for about 3 minutes.  then, we ran outside and across the street to an empty field where we saw it....  we began jumping and shouting below it.  it hovered with no noise just about 5 foot above a telephone pole. you could sense a mass above you - this was not projection of any kind.   it was about 3000 square foot round and the underside had white lights that went around in sequence.  it looked just like the old game simon from that time period, but with more lights.  it was round just like your cliche saucer, but it was thicker than i had heard in stories.  it was just thick/tall enough that a man would have about 5 to 10 inches headroom if he was standing up.  i could not see the surface since it was dark outside, the object was above me, and the lights obscured any view of the object except a solid, dark outline.  it hovered for about a minute, and we jumped and carried on under it the whole time.  then, it turned south and within about two seconds, it went from 3000 sq foot to a pin head with no sound.  i did hear the faint sound of wind slice, but no propellers, no jets, no flame, no cloud, nothing!!  at the time, i didn't realize how important what i saw was and it was just stored into my memory for years.  i talked to my sister in our thirties and she remembered it too and continually says to me, "what was that we saw?"  none of us had active imaginations, and this was definitely no figment of our imaginations.  we had a very normal childhood with no drama, etc... just a regular family life.  i have grown to believe most persons speaking on ufo's and those speaking about ghosts.  i have to, otherwise, i couldn't believe myself!
content.summary: 3000 square foot saucer with white sequential lights on underside hovered for about 4 minutes.  was 5 ft above telephone pole.  we waved and jumped under it.  it took off, turned south, and made no noise when hovering or taking off.  2 secs - size of pin

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq by field investigator l.F. with witness on the phone. 7/15/2015
___________________________________________________________________________

in 1957 my grandfather and i were picking plums in a field when we heard a rumbling, roaring sound. we looked up and saw a craft coming towards us. when they saw us they slowed down and stared at us through a large window, we stared back in awe.
the craft was plexi glass like material on the top and shiny, weathered, chrome like on the bottom. it was as large as a cessna and it was saucer shaped. it had a large window with three humanoids looking out at us. two had blond hair and really blue eyes, one was male with a blue uniform with a strip coming down from his shoulder to his waist, and the female had wavy blond hair, another female had a  pony tail colored brown. they resembled vikings in features. we could see other beings wearing dark robes in the background bent over a table. the craft made no noise, but we did hear a rumbling in the background, but it wasn't coming from the craft, the craft was silent. when it went over us it was about tree top or 150 feet high, and about 200 yards from us. as it passed over us at about 25 mph,the very bottom was black. it was traveling from west to east and had no lights on.
it sped up after passing us and we lost sight of it.

i was 7 years old and asked my grandfather, who was 58 years old at the time, what was that? he said in spanish "avionics from another world"
my grandfather rode with pancho villa and didn't seem surprised to see the ufo. 
the humanoids seemed almost friendly, and we felt no ill effects from seeing them.
then the roaring increased after they were gone, and two us korean war jets passed by chasing them.
we never talked about it again, like our little secret. 
i saw a show on hanger 1 about people seeing the aliens inside ships, and had to tell my story.
i was in the 84th airborne, during the vietnam war and never saw ships like that before.
content.summary: In 1957 my grandfather and i were picking plums in a field when we saw a craft coming towards us, when they saw us they slowed down and stared at us

content.detailedDescription: I was in my apartment in my bed at night but i am having trouble sleep.I noticed the ufo when i looked at the window.I that it was a star or an airplane.It was a triangle ufo with lights to make it's shape,3 lights in patariclar.It didn't make a movement or a sound it was a stationary movement.I was scared and confused will said this in my mind" i get invade with my family and get abducted?".After 2 minutes it became fainter by that minute  and soon it vanished silently.
content.summary: A triangle figure showed lights that formed a figure that looked a lot like a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work on sunday july 12, 2015 around 10:30pm. i was talking to a few buddies in the parking lot for a while and happened to look up between our two buildings and asked "is that the little dipper? it seems a little bright." one of my friends responded, "yeah, it's just the little dipper." i noticed the three lights were moving very slow, and then one of my friends confirmed that they also noticed the lights moving slowly and then into a straight line. they kind of laughed it off and left shortly after. i stayed to photograph the objects.

i continued to watch the lights move slowly across the sky in perfect precise movements. their distance from each other remained the same. the lights never blinked or pulsated- it was a constant light being emitted. i kept thinking they could just be military planes or aircraft being tested, but i noticed several aircraft fly by (under these objects as far as altitude is concerned) and these objects seemed to be much larger and brighter than the tiny blinking lights of the aircraft (most likely commercial airliners do the proximity of an international airport/airforce base). 

as i continued to watch the objects, the middle light started to rise and would eventually form a triangle. at this moment, i noticed a fourth light of equal brightness. as the lights remained in this position for about 5 minutes, they started to get back into their straight line formation. it was at this point that i decided to call my wife. i told her of the event and she seemed interested but kind of wanted to see my pictures to believe it. i got into my car and made my commute home (west) but i could still see the objects to my left as i drove westbound on interstate 26. eventually these lights faded into the night sky as they became further and further apart from each other.

i submitted the pictures to an online forum and someone enhanced them for me, and i was absolutley baffled by what i saw- they almost appeared as spheres.

i tried to take some video, but the quality was not worth sharing. i really hope there is an explanation for this event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright lights spotted. observed for well over an hour. formed a line, then triangle.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were having a bonfire in the driveway and at 10:25pm eastern time a orangesh red orb came flying across from the boston hills in new york at a steady pace. it flew across the sky until it hovered over lake erie and disappeared. at 10:32 a second orb of the same description took the same flight pattern. this one i got video of. it also flew over lake erie and disappeared. it was not until we watched it after that my wife and i believed what we just saw.
content.summary: I have a vedio of second one flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my mothers garden just looking up at the lovely clear blue sky when i noticed the first object and watched it carefully because of its' shape, which seemed rectangular, but could have been cylindrical with squared off ends. i couldn't make out any projections from its' defined shape.
my first thought was that it was a chinese lantern, but it travelled too steadily for that and wasn't increasing its' height. there was definitely no vapour trail, and no noise.
after a while another object - exactly the same as the first - appeared travelling in the opposite direction. the two passed and i watched until they were out of sight behind buildings. they both maintained very steady and straight flight paths and constant height.
they did not appear to be on one of the regular aircraft flight paths for that area, which is quite busy with flights from manchester/leeds bradford/doncaster and humberside airports.
usually it is easy to see incoming and outgoing planes very clearly, and those at height always clearly show vapour trails. these had none, and they also struck me as strange because of their plain white colour with sunlight bouncing off them.
i didn't feel anything other than curiosity, and concentrated hard to try to make out any signs that the objects were ordinary planes, but couldn't, and unfortunately didn't have a camera.
content.summary: object  clearly visible. maybe as high as aircraft. then another appeared travelling in opposite direction. neither seemed on regular flight path.  th

content.detailedDescription: Someone can call me. i'd rather tell someone in person.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 1130 am 7/15/2015 two very bright objects hovering directly above me,i think they were in space but idk. then these two eject 3 little "ufos" and they swirl and dance around for a while. the the three zip away at incredible speeds. like shooting stars!

content.detailedDescription: I was out back around 9pm on 7/14/15 playing with my yukon night ranger monocular looking in the sky. once they were focused in i was looking at the stars then noticed two bright orbs slowly moving to right direction. the top one stopped and then the second one kept moving slowly. after 30 minutes of watching these things move back and forth and then up and down a third one pops up out of the tree line. it started slowly moving towards the other two orbs. i watched these things for a good 2 hours through my night vision setup and never saw anything like this. they were not plans since one passed by and defiently not lanterns or drones of anytype. i wish i would of recorded this since it was a interesting show. i called my gf to watch and then the two top orbs moved closed together like dual headlights then slowly separated. not sure what they were upto but having night vision lets you see everything that the human eye can't in the sky. all i can say is that was something et. will be watching the sky tonight with a recording setup to capture these things.
content.summary: Crazy moving orbs in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, we where hanging out a group of friends at my friend's rooftop in putnam st and nostrand ave, in brooklyn. ny. the sky was clear with only a few little clouds north east.
it was around four thirty am, we were chatting and i turned my head around to the west, i saw what i thought it was a star first. inside me i felt something was off. didn't realizing what was wrong yet, i thought to pull up my iphone app that maps the night sky and can tell the name off stars and constellations. because i thought it could be the north star but i don't know, something was weird, i couldn't see any other stars near by because luminescent pollution, plus that thing was bigger than the north star, in the wrong place and its light wasn't withe, was clearly yellow/orange. as all this thoughts are happening at once, one of our girlfriends decides to leave, so i take my eyes off the light, to say good night to my friend, it probably took three minutes or even less, when i decided to look back to the light on the west to use the app. 
to my surprise that thing had descend is moving and is about to pass right over us, still looks the same but is bigger now.
at this point i know is not a star because is moving so i tell my friends to look at it, we all look at it, i suggest it might be a satellite. but i had seen satellites before sailing at night in the sea, that couldn't be a satellite, conditions in brooklyn are never right to star gaze and it was to big and flying too low and too slow. my feeling was that thing descend first in an approximate forty-five degree angle towards us and now it's on straight flight path north east...
we kept tracking the light and then, it brooke the flight path moving south east, then two seconds later back to north east, next second straight down, it dimmed disappeared, then about three seconds later reappeared, moved upwards and then ascended again in an forty something degree angle like it was gonna leave the atmosphere, until it faded away.

we were astounded by it, one of my friends said he first thought i was star before we noticed it was moving. all this took about eight minutes but that light had to be visible to us at least twenty to twenty five minutes since it first appeared in the sky. right before and after we could see commercial airplanes flying by much higher, we could totally contrast  those with the light we had just seen, meaning it was not an airplane, it made no noise and it wasn't flying fast, it kind of floated, always moving straight lines even when changing directions. it had no signaling lights like airplanes, it was just a big bright yellow dot passing by with no flickering, no way it could be an air ballon either or an elicopter.
content.summary: Star-like ufo over brooklyn.

content.detailedDescription: Enhanced images of mib don't match description that witnesses describe?
content.summary: Mib entering hotel

content.detailedDescription: In aug 2009.I am just going to report straight of the top of my head as i did before.In killarney manitoba , i was witness to many sightings, some with witnesses.The one that i can remember best and still leaves a lasting memory happened in aug 09.My daughter had a sighting of this orb glowing white it was big as 2 school buses belly to belly. we watched as it came down the street and stopped in the backyard and hovered there for a few seconds.A door in this storm or what i would call a very large ship  was cloaked , opened and the orb went into and the door closed.At the same time this storm was pulsating blue, red and white colors same place everytime.This was the second time i had seen this orb.But the first i had seen this cloaked ship.There was no dought in my mind this was aufo it sat for a few min.Approximatley 10 min.It then took off just as the morning sun was rising.I never saw it go cause it was so fast but, i watched the clouds going in the opposite direction were doing a million miles an hr.The sun came up and no storm and a beautiful day.As i said i saw some other sightings, a friend and i were looking at the stars when a brite white light came flyihg into sight stopped for a second then in a flash gone.I have also seen large ships in the sky over town which could be seen reflecting in the water , the stars didn't reflect but these did.A buddy and myself were in the town park one night.I asked him if he had noticed any ufo sightings and just as i had said this a small cigar shaped one flew by and down the shoreline.I thought wow this place is crazy.As i said before about the white orb, i was at my relatives and my uncle and auntie also saw this orb come across there farm land.My aunt missed getting a picture by seconds.I think i put new thoughts in my relatives as my uncle thought it was a astronaut coming down.I thought sure here in the boonies thats gonna appen and plus there were no reports of any kind the next day on tv.I could go on but i think this is good for now.Do i believe yes sir no dought we are not alone!I make this report on my life that it had happened!
content.summary: I have seen orbs before but this 1, came down the street over my house then stopped at the same time i had this  what i thought was a storm with lightning but no sound.A door opened and this orb we saw went in and the door closed.It sat there for app.10 m

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was at disneyland california adventure in anaheim. i had just gotten off a ride.

2. i looked up and noticed the perfect circle in the sky and immediately everyone began looking up as well.

3. to be completely honest my friends and i were scared because it did appear to be a black hole or something if that sort. we tried assuming it was from fireworks but there is never fireworks in the california adventure park and it was a perfect circle.

4. it did not move but it was a smoky perfect circle.

5. at first we were like wow that's a perfect circle! then we started to take pictures and soon everyone began. we were a little bit weirded out and we left the park immediately after.

6. we left the park.
content.summary: I was at disneyland there were no fireworks at that time when we looked up and saw this everyone began taking photos because it was different.
